name: Pyroty
description:
You control a flame headed guy through the shadows and own abyss.
Each failure increase his inner fury, and become more and more powerful.

I made this game within two days for Wowie Jam 3.0!
( The topic was: FAILURE IS PROGRESS )

I recommend PC version if you have any performance issues!

CONTROLS:
WASD - movement
MOUSE - look, aim, fire
(FAIL) - gain power

I wrote most of the code and I drew the characters earlier.
But I've also used some assets, you found in the Credits section.
I hope you will enjoy. The game is not too long, with a great ending.
I worked so hard on this, almost all day and night.

CREDITS:
Background music via https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
Font - PR Uncial Creepy by Peter Rempel
